trans-unit.target: Devolve uma subcadeia de cadeia de formato, opcionalmente, incluindo carateres de palavra-passe.

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method returns a substring of the formatted string, starting at the position `startPos` and including the subsequent number of characters specified by the `length` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do sobrecarregado <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>método devolve uma subcadeia de cadeia de formato, começando na posição `startPos` e, incluindo o número de carateres especificado pelo subsequente o `length` parâmetro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The returned string includes prompts and literals according to the current values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia devolvida inclui pedidos e literais de acordo com os valores atuais do <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>Propriedades, respetivamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `ignorePasswordChar` parameter is `true`, it will return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o `ignorePasswordChar` parâmetro é `true`, devolverá os carateres de entrada originais, a ignorar o valor da <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is `false`, it will use the password character to obscure editable user input if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se este parâmetro for `false`, irá utilizar o carácter de palavra-passe para ocultar a intervenção do utilizador editável se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>propriedade está definida como um valor diferente de `null`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because this method potentially reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Porque este método de revela potencialmente informações que, normalmente, protegidas na interface de utilizador por carateres de palavra-passe, deve ser utilizada com é necessário ter muito cuidado para evitar acidentalmente revelando dados confidenciais do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> performs the following actions when there are discrepancies in the input parameters: - If `startPos` is less than zero, the starting position is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>executa as ações seguintes quando existem discrepâncias nos parâmetros de entrada: - se `startPos` é menor que zero, a posição inicial está definida como zero.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If `startPos` is greater than or equal to the actual <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -Se `startPos` é maior que ou igual a real <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>da cadeia de formato, o <xref:System.String.Empty>é devolveu uma cadeia.</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is greater than the remaining number of characters past the starting position, only the remaining characters are returned.
trans-unit.target: -Se `length` é maior do que o número restante de carateres passados a posição inicial, só os restantes carateres é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is less than or equal to zero, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -Se `length` é menor ou igual a zero, o <xref:System.String.Empty>é devolveu uma cadeia.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the actual editable characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*> property is to be honored.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para devolver os carateres editáveis reais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para indicar que o <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>propriedade está a ser honrado.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the output begins.
trans-unit.target: A posição baseado em zero na cadeia de formato em que começa a saída.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to return.
trans-unit.target: O número de carateres a devolver.

trans-unit.source: If successful, a substring of the formatted <xref:System.String>, which includes literals, prompts, and optionally password characters; otherwise the <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver êxito, uma subcadeia da formatados <xref:System.String>, que inclui literais, avisos e, opcionalmente, carateres de palavra-passe; caso contrário o <xref:System.String>cadeia.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring of the formatted string, optionally including prompt and literal characters.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma subcadeia de cadeia de formato, opcionalmente, incluindo carateres de linha de comandos e literais.

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method returns a substring of the formatted string, starting at the position `startPos` and including the subsequent number of characters specified by the `length` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do sobrecarregado <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>método devolve uma subcadeia de cadeia de formato, começando na posição `startPos` e, incluindo o número de carateres especificado pelo subsequente o `length` parâmetro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The return string includes prompts and literals according to the values of the `IncludePrompt` and `IncludeLiterals` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de retorno inclui pedidos e literais de acordo com os valores de `IncludePrompt` e `IncludeLiterals` parâmetros, respetivamente.

trans-unit.source: Notice that these parameters override the values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A><xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que estes parâmetros substituem os valores de <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will always return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolverá sempre os carateres de entrada originais, a ignorar o valor da <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because this method reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Porque este método de revela informações que, normalmente, protegidas na interface de utilizador por carateres de palavra-passe, deve ser utilizada com é necessário ter muito cuidado para evitar acidentalmente revelando dados confidenciais do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> performs the following actions when there are discrepancies in the input parameters: - If `startPos` is less than zero, the starting position is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>executa as ações seguintes quando existem discrepâncias nos parâmetros de entrada: - se `startPos` é menor que zero, a posição inicial está definida como zero.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If `startPos` is greater than or equal to the actual <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -Se `startPos` é maior que ou igual a real <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>da cadeia de formato, o <xref:System.String.Empty>é devolveu uma cadeia.</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is greater than the remaining number of characters past the starting position, only the remaining characters are returned.
trans-unit.target: -Se `length` é maior do que o número restante de carateres passados a posição inicial, só os restantes carateres é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is less than or equal to zero, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -Se `length` é menor ou igual a zero, o <xref:System.String.Empty>é devolveu uma cadeia.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include prompt characters in the return string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para incluir caracteres prompt na cadeia de retorno; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include literal characters in the return string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para incluir carateres literais na cadeia de retorno; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the output begins.
trans-unit.target: A posição baseado em zero na cadeia de formato em que começa a saída.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to return.
trans-unit.target: O número de carateres a devolver.

trans-unit.source: If successful, a substring of the formatted <xref:System.String>, which includes all the assigned character values and optionally includes literals and prompts; otherwise the <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver êxito, uma subcadeia da formatados <xref:System.String>, que inclui todos os valores do caráter atribuído e opcionalmente inclui literais e pede; caso contrário o <xref:System.String>cadeia.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring of the formatted string, optionally including prompt, literal, and password characters.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma subcadeia de cadeia de formato, opcionalmente, incluindo carateres de linha de comandos, literal e palavra-passe.

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method returns a substring of the formatted string, starting at the position `startPos` and including the subsequent number of characters specified by the `length` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do sobrecarregado <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>método devolve uma subcadeia de cadeia de formato, começando na posição `startPos` e, incluindo o número de carateres especificado pelo subsequente o `length` parâmetro.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The return string includes prompts and literals according to the values of the `IncludePrompt` and `IncludeLiterals` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de retorno inclui pedidos e literais de acordo com os valores de `IncludePrompt` e `IncludeLiterals` parâmetros, respetivamente.

trans-unit.source: Notice that these parameters override the values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que estes parâmetros substituem os valores de <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `ignorePasswordChar` parameter is `true`, it will return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o `ignorePasswordChar` parâmetro é `true`, devolverá os carateres de entrada originais, a ignorar o valor da <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is `false`, it will use the password character to obscure editable user input if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se este parâmetro for `false`, irá utilizar o carácter de palavra-passe para ocultar a intervenção do utilizador editável se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>propriedade está definida como um valor diferente de `null`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because this method potentially reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Porque este método de revela potencialmente informações que, normalmente, protegidas na interface de utilizador por carateres de palavra-passe, deve ser utilizada com é necessário ter muito cuidado para evitar acidentalmente revelando dados confidenciais do utilizador.

trans-unit.target: O número de carateres a devolver.

trans-unit.source: If successful, a substring of the formatted <xref:System.String>, which includes all the assigned character values and optionally includes literals, prompts, and password characters; otherwise the <xref:System.String> string.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified character could be set successfully at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Testa se o caráter especificado foi definido com êxito na posição especificada.

trans-unit.source: The VerifyChar method tests whether a single character value represents valid input at the specified position in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: O método VerifyChar testa se um valor de carácter único representa um valor válido na posição especificada na cadeia de formato.

trans-unit.source: This method will return `false` for the following reasons: - The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método irá devolver `false` pelas seguintes razões: - `pos` parâmetro é menor que zero ou superior <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>do <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The character `input` is not a valid input character, as determined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidInputChar%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: -O caráter `input` não é um caráter de entrada válido, conforme determinado pelo <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidInputChar%2A>método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidInputChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The `input` is not compatible with the mask element at the specified position, `pos`.
trans-unit.target: -O `input` não é compatível com o elemento de máscara da posição especificada, `pos`.

trans-unit.source: The last condition may depend on the current value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A condição último pode depender o valor atual do <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: To test an entire input string against the mask, use one of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: Para testar uma cadeia de entrada completa relativamente a máscara, utilize um do <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>métodos em vez disso.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> value to test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Char>valor a testar.</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The position in the mask to test the input character against.
trans-unit.target: A posição na máscara para testar o carácter de entrada contra.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> that succinctly describes the result of the operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref> que succinctly descreve o resultado da operação.

trans-unit.source: An output parameter.
trans-unit.target: Um parâmetro de saída.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified character is valid for the specified position; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter especificado é válido para a posição especificada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified character would be escaped at the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Testa se o caráter especificado seria possível caráter de escape correto na posição especificada.

trans-unit.source: A character is said to be *escaped* if it is valid input, but is not assigned to that position in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: Um caráter possui correspondências é denominado *escape* se é de entrada válido, mas não está atribuído a nessa posição na cadeia de formato.

trans-unit.source: Escaped characters fall into the following three categories: - Prompt characters are escaped if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Carateres de escape enquadram-se três categorias a seguir:-caracteres Prompt são escape se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Input characters are escaped if they have the same value as the literal in the mask, and if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: -Entradas carateres são escape se têm o mesmo valor que o literal na máscara e o <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.SkipLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Space characters are escaped if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: -Espaços são escape se o <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A>propriedade é `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A>

trans-unit.source: The VerifyEscapeChar method will also return `false` if the `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O método VerifyEscapeChar também irá devolver `false` se o `pos` parâmetro é menor que zero ou superior <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>do <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> value to test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Char>valor a testar.</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The position in the mask to test the input character against.
trans-unit.target: A posição na máscara para testar o carácter de entrada contra.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified character would be escaped at the specified position; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caráter especificado seria possível caráter de escape correto na posição especificada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified string could be set successfully.
trans-unit.target: Testa se a cadeia especificada pode ser definida com êxito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> applies the `input` string against the mask, without actually changing the formatted string, to test whether `input` would be valid in a corresponding <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>aplica-se a `input` cadeia contra a máscara, sem alterar, na verdade, a cadeia de formato, para testar se `input` seria válido num correspondente <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>operação.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `true` if input is `null` or has zero length.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve também `true` se for de entrada `null` ou tem o comprimento zero.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value to test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>valor a testar.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified string represents valid input; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a cadeia especificada representa uma entrada válida; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the specified string could be set successfully, and then outputs position and descriptive information.
trans-unit.target: Testa se a cadeia especificada foi definida com êxito e, em seguida, devolve a posição e informações descritivas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> applies the `input` string against the mask, without actually changing the formatted string, to test whether `input` would be valid in a corresponding <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>aplica-se a `input` cadeia contra a máscara, sem alterar, na verdade, a cadeia de formato, para testar se `input` seria válido num correspondente <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>operação.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method also returns `true` if input is `null` or has zero length.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve também `true` se for de entrada `null` ou tem o comprimento zero.

trans-unit.source: This version of <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> provides two additional output parameters to convey more information about the operation of the method.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>fornece dois parâmetros de saída adicionais para transmitir mais informações sobre a operação do método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> value to test.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.String>valor a testar.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If successful, the zero-based position of the last character actually tested; otherwise, the first position where the test failed.
